name: Midnight Wave: Character Creator
description:
Midnight Wave is a cyberpunk samurai tactical action RPG featuring immense customization, narrative choice, and innovative combinations of game mechanics you know and love; all set in a world full of katanas, mega corporations, and elemental powers. Inspired by legendary series such as Fire Emblem, Persona, Super Smash Bros., and Mass Effect, Midnight Wave invites you to take part in a total genre mash-up adventure like no-other! You can see a trailer for the actual game here and a description of this character creator below:

The original free to download character creator from our failed Kickstarter is now replaced with this updated paid version due to us indie devs being extremely broke! If you'd like to support the game's development, consider purchasing this, or check out our Patreon for all sorts of perks .  For example, our Patrons decide on new items and get new builds first! Thanks so much for your support!
